title: AlexandrTDS
author: AlexandrTDS
content: Arbitrum has launched the second week of the Odyssey, in which we are to interact with tofuNFT and Aboard.¬†üìùACTIONS TO PARTICIPATE:‚Ä¢ Go to the site and buy/sell any NFT;‚Ä¢ Go to the site perform the remaining social.task and claim NFT;‚Ä¢ Go to the site point at the icon of the wallet, choose Deposit and throw $USDC;‚Ä¢ Go to the Dashboard tab and transfer $USDC tokens from the Fund to the Perpetual account.‚Ä¢ Go to the site and do Perpetual trade;‚Ä¢ Go to the site and the claim NFT.üìÜ Deadline: October 7

comments.author: AlexandrTDS
comments.body: Due to the Galxe hack, Arbitrum has decided to extend Week 2 of the Odyssey, which will resume on October 16th. If you have already completed all the quests and claim the NFTs, then you will not need to redo the tasks again.
